trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> event when an Edit button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Edit") is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollere hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>-hendelse når en Rediger-knappen (en knapp med den `CommandName` egenskapen satt til "Edit") klikkes, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontroll registrerer redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the edit operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel avbryter redigeringsoperasjonen, når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: A GridViewEditEventArgs object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the index of the row being edited and to indicate that the edit operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: En GridViewEditEventArgs-objekt er sendt til hendelseshåndtering metoden, som gjør det mulig å finne ut indeksen i raden redigeres og å angi at redigeringsoperasjonen bør avbrytes.

trans-unit.source: To cancel the edit operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the GridViewEditEventArgs object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil avbryte redigeringsoperasjonen, angitt i <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>for GridViewEditEventArgs-objektet til `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of GridViewEditEventArgs, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av GridViewEditEventArgs, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å initialisere en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdien for en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs.NewEditIndex%2A>|The value of the `newEditIndex` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs.NewEditIndex%2A>| Verdien for den `newEditIndex` parameteren. | > [!NOTE] > Denne konstruktøren brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere ved å heve hendelser.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs.NewEditIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to edit.
Gets or sets the index of the row being edited.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir indeksen i raden som redigeres.

trans-unit.source: Use the NewEditIndex property to determine the index of the row being edited.
trans-unit.target: Bruk NewEditIndex-egenskapen til å fastslå indeksen i raden som redigeres.

trans-unit.source: The row index is often used to retrieve this row from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, which allows you to access the row's properties.
trans-unit.target: Radindeksen ofte brukes til å hente denne raden fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>samling av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen, som gir deg tilgang til den raden egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row being edited.
